"The Time Traveler's Mistake" - A time traveler goes back in time to prevent a catastrophic event, butaces andaces, causing the opposite effect and the ocean dries up.
"The Curse of the Ocean" - An ancient curse is unleashed, causing the ocean to dry up and the creatures that live there to vanish.
"The Great Drought" - A global drought strikes, causing the ocean levels to drop and the ocean to dry up.
"The Ocean's Secret" - A secret society discovers the ocean's secret and uses it to dry it up, causing chaos and destruction.
"The Ocean's Revenge" - The ocean, fed up with human exploitation, decides to dry up and take revenge on the world.
